content: I just published a crate to crates.io. The doc build fails because one of the dependencies (xcb) apparently has a build script which tries to write into the read only filesystem (OUT_DIR not respected). Is there an easy way for me to avoid this? Removing the dependency is not an option.
Fix the build script to not do that would be my suggestion
@Luis Wirth that should be fixed in the latest version of xcb IIRC
@Joshua Nelson Thanks for letting me know :). I will switch from clipboard to copypasta because it has xcb up to date.
